title: Video Conferencing-Based Accelerated Learning Program for International Legal Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-based video conferencing learning environment for current professionals, focusing on intermediate-level expertise in international private law

learning_goals: Learners can explain principles of jurisdiction and governing law determination by analyzing international private law dispute cases
Learners complete over 80% of practical tasks evaluating the legal validity of international contract clauses using video conferencing collaboration tools
Learners summarize 20 major international private law precedents and propose practical applications through microlearning content provided on mobile learning platforms
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
